patthana16.31:1.1: Pītisahagataṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca napītisahagato nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā aṭṭhavīsa …pe… avigate aṭṭhavīsa.
patthana16.31:2.1: Pītisahagataṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naupekkhāsahagato nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā aṭṭhārasa …pe… avigate aṭṭhārasa.
